ExportDef.Title: Doctors2 Export
ExportDef.SQLCMD:
---- DECLARE @tdate DATETIME, @bdate DATETIME, @edate DATETIME, @tdate_adj INT;
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SET @tdate_adj = 30; -- Variable used to calculate @tdate value
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SET @tdate = GETDATE()-@tdate_adj; SET @bdate = (SELECT BeginDate FROM tblCycleXLAT WHERE @tdate BETWEEN BeginDate AND EndDate AND XlatID = 'MTH'); SET @edate = (SELECT EndDate FROM tblCycleXLAT WHERE @tdate BETWEEN BeginDate AND EndDate AND XlatID = 'MTH');
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT ohd.accountNo AS [AccountNo] ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),SUM(dtl.TransTotal),0) AS [TransTotal] ,ohd.Firstname AS [FirstName] ,ohd.LastName AS [LastName] ,CASE WHEN dtl.TransID = 6 THEN 5 WHEN dtl.TransID = 7 THEN 1 ELSE dtl.TransID END AS [TransID]
,dtl.TransDate AS [TransDate]
FROM tbldetail AS dtl LEFT JOIN tblAccountOHD AS ohd ON ohd.accountNo = dtl.AccountNo
WHERE dtl.TransDate BETWEEN @bdate AND @edate AND dtl.TransId < 500 AND ohd.AccountClassID = 40
GROUP BY ohd.AccountNo ,dtl.TransDate ,ohd.FirstName ,ohd.LastName ,dtl.TransTotal ,dtl.TransID
ORDER BY ohd.AccountNo
----
